page.title: 09LIVING IN TOTLEY
page.content: Local residents find this area pleasant to live in because of its ready access to the lovely countryside of the {Peak National Park,}its friendly village atmosphere,and good range of amenities. A housewife commented, "There are plenty of shops of all kinds, although they are small and limited in their stock." Leisure facilities include a public library, a private sports club and a shooting range. There are two recreation grounds with a childrens' playground, bowling greens and tennis courts. Schools are reported to be well equipped and providing wide curricula for their pupils.Community groups include 3 Mothers'& Toddlers' groups.
